‘Betrayed your trust’: Dilworth School apologises for decades of abuse https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/betrayed-your-trust-dilworth-school-apologises-for-decades-for-decades-obuse/ceemehkvm5fwzepxz2xa3hcxc4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/betrayed-your-trust-dilworth-school-apologises-for-decades-for-decades-obuse/ceemehkvm5fwzepxz2xa3hcxc4/ Incoming Dilworth School trust board chair Jonathan Mason issued the apology. Sat, 01 Mar 2025 04:40:35 +0000 Incoming Dilworth School trust board chairman Jonathan Mason has apologised to survivors, to others who had died, to their families, to all past and present students and staff and to the founders of the school who have endured child sexual abuse and the associated stigma. Photo / Dean Purcell.
Auckland stabbing in Takanini: Hero couple tell how they helped three stab victims https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-stabbing-in-takanini-hero-couple-couple-tell-how-tell-how-they-helped-three-stab-victims/rz7gahac75djxl6h3323232323ftscm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-stabbing-in-takanini-hero-couple-couple-tell-how-tell-how-they-helped-three-stab-victims/rz7gahac75djxl6h3323232323ftscm/ Ben Leahy'It’s still in my mind, the shouting, [and begging] save us,' witness tells Herald. Red tape ties up ruler-sized memorial for slain veteran – ‘there’s protocols and rules’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/red-tape-ties-up-ruler-sied-memorial-for-slain-veteran-veteran-theran-theres-protocococols-and-rules/upnfjpdgt5a7jdgqr5lcur5lcur3jey/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/red-tape-ties-up-ruler-sied-memorial-for-slain-veteran-veteran-theran-theres-protocococols-and-rules/upnfjpdgt5a7jdgqr5lcur5lcur3jey/ David FisherThey shall grow not old and age shall not weary them – but no one escapes bureaucracy. Sat, 01 Mar 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Rory Malone lost his life fighting in Afghanistan – now several years on his name is caught up in a wrangle over a public memorial.
